rows.label: tev000391_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0002
rows.name:
Thought I'd take a breather here, but I can't relax with
that damn dog wandering around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000391_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if Lao hates dogs.

rows.label: tev000391_JNK0020
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: tev000391_SEL0021
rows.name: Say sorry for any trouble your dog caused.

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0003
rows.name: Nah, I don't have anything particular against them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0004
rows.name:
In fact, back when I was still a snot-nosed brat,
I actually had a pup myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0005
rows.name: But she died when I was pretty young.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0006
rows.name: Of course, everything that lives will die one day...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0011
rows.name:
But seeing them just reminds me of how powerless
I was to stop it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0012
rows.name:
That's your dog? Nah, it didn't do nothing wrong.
Seems plenty friendly to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0013
rows.name: I'm sure you and Lin are taking good care of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0014
rows.name:
I used to have a dog myself, but she died when I was
just a kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0015
rows.name:
I know that death is a part of life, but it still tore me
up to know there was nothing I could do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0016
rows.name:
To this day, whenever I see a dog, I can't help but
feel the pangs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0017
rows.name:
The more good times you've had together,
the more it hurts to lose someone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0018
rows.name: Don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000391_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Lao he's spot-on.

rows.label: tev000391_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev000391_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Lao he's mistaken.

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0019
rows.name: Yeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0020
rows.name:
Even now, when I think about all the people we left
behind on Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0021
rows.name:
Never mind. I know that's not something anyone
wants to talk about first thing in the morning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0022
rows.name: Ah, that's right. You don't even remember your past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0023
rows.name:
Me, I don't know that I'll ever be able to forget the
people we abandoned on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0024
rows.name:
I don't ever want to see anything like that happen
again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well, this place is making me jumpy, so I'm gonna
head to the diner or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0030
rows.name:
That dog sniffing at my heels kinda bummed me out,
but...thanks for talking me through it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000391_MSG0031
rows.name: Anyway, see ya around, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
